payload.message:
Daily OpenClaw Update Check

1. Check current OpenClaw version by running: openclaw status or gateway config.get
2. Run openclaw update: gateway action=update.run
3. Check version after update
4. Post results to Discord channel #daily with:
   - Current version (before)
   - Update attempt status
   - New version (after)
   - Any important notes
